headline: Plenty of Urban Boomers, Yet Fewer Than in Generations Past
abstract: Baby boomers are actually less drawn to urban living than previous generations.
lead_paragraph: Baby boomers are such a large group that you can find them practically everywhere in great numbers, including in urban areas. Today in cities, for example, youâ€™re more likely to run into a 54-to-72-year-old with your bike or scooter (please be careful!) than you would have in the past.
